firstParagraph.text:
Hello 👋 As said above I am a
frontend developer. I worked as a
print designer after my studies, but
I quickly found that it was missing
some interactions, so I started to
learn to code.

secondParagraph.text:
Now I really like to create
animations, transitions and
interactions with fresh and
cool designs. Pizzaiolo in my
free time, I’m looking for the
best homemade pizzas in town,
but what I like the most is to eat them. 🍕

like.likeTitle:
Now that we’ve seen
what I’ve done,
let’s see together
what I’d like to do / learn
like.contactText:
so if you can help me make
these things happen, Please
feel free to drop me a line
